estimated_calories.notes: Estimate based on a plate of primarily broccoli and possibly other vegetables. Calories can vary based on portion size and preparation method (e.g., raw vs. cooked with oil).

macronutrient_breakdown.notes: Broccoli is low in fat and a good source of fiber and plant-based protein. Fat content may increase if cooked with oil or butter.

key_vitamins_and_minerals.vitamin_K: High (important for blood clotting and bone health)
key_vitamins_and_minerals.folate: Moderate (supports cell division and DNA synthesis)
key_vitamins_and_minerals.notes: Broccoli is nutrient-dense, providing a wide array of vitamins and minerals with minimal calories.

health_benefits.digestive_health: High fiber content supports gut health and regularity.
health_benefits.immune_support: Vitamin C boosts immune function and acts as an antioxidant.
health_benefits.anti-inflammatory: Contains compounds like sulforaphane, which may reduce inflammation.
health_benefits.bone_health: Vitamin K and calcium contribute to strong bones.
health_benefits.low_calorie: Ideal for weight management due to high volume and low calories.

potential_allergens_or_concerns.allergens: None commonly associated with broccoli or typical vegetables.
potential_allergens_or_concerns.dietary_concerns: May cause bloating or gas in some individuals due to high fiber content. Those on blood thinners should monitor vitamin K intake.

recommendations_for_a_healthier_meal.add_protein: Include a lean protein source like grilled chicken, tofu, or beans to make the meal more balanced.
recommendations_for_a_healthier_meal.healthy_fats: Add a small portion of avocado or a drizzle of olive oil for healthy fats and improved nutrient absorption.
recommendations_for_a_healthier_meal.whole_grains: Pair with quinoa or brown rice for complex carbohydrates and added fiber.
recommendations_for_a_healthier_meal.variety: Incorporate other colorful vegetables (e.g., carrots, bell peppers) to increase nutrient diversity.
recommendations_for_a_healthier_meal.preparation_method: Opt for steaming or roasting instead of frying to minimize added fats.
